org.xlattice.httpd.headers

Class AbstractURI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.httpd.Header
      • org.xlattice.httpd.headers.AbstractURI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractHeader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentLocationHeader, LocationHeader, RefererHeader

    public abstract class AbstractURI
extends Header
    Superclass of HTTP headers whose field value is an absolute or relative URI.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

    • Constructor Summary
